titleStmt.title: The life and death of Sheffery ap Morgan, son of Shon ap Morgan

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon at the Angel in Guiltspur-street near New-Gate,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Title page contains woodcut with four scenes.
In ms. on t.p.: Bought at Oxon. 1688.
Facing t.p., 1 p. containing: The distressed Welshman.
Imperfect: all after p. 14 lacking in filmed copy; stained, tightly bound, and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Angel in Guiltspur-street near New-Gate
